title: Input Atlas
tagline: A curated collection of high-quality AI prompts for the community
description: A comprehensive library of expertly crafted AI prompts across multiple categories. Input Atlas helps users get better results from AI tools by providing tested, high-quality prompts with clear use cases and examples.

title: AI Context System
tagline: Externalize AI reasoning. Enable perfect session continuity.
description: A CLI tool for AI coding assistants that externalizes AI context into structured documentation, enabling developers to resume projects seamlessly and maintain visibility into AI decision-making processes.

title: Podcast Framework
tagline: Build beautiful podcast websites in minutes
description: A production-ready framework for creating podcast websites using modern web technologies. Combines content management with static site generation to help podcasters launch professional sites without extensive development time.
